analyzed: rdzun smra ba'i lce'i kha las bkres pa dang / skom pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: or to take a lover,🔽or to take a wife,🔽or to take a husband,🔽or to take a son,🔽or to take a daughter,🔽or to take a servant

original: zhal ce yon por gcod pa ni skad cig skad cig la skye zhing sreg go /🔽sreg pa na tshor ba'i rnam pa de @343a *//
analyzed: zhal ce yon por gcod pa ni skad cig skad cig la skye zhing sreg go / sreg pa na tshor ba'i rnam pa de @343a *//
translated: The crooked judgements of the court arise and burn in every moment.

original: lta bu myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lta bu myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: When burning, one experiences the following sensations:

original: gang me lce'i phung po de dag ni bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
analyzed: gang me lce'i phung po de dag ni bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
translated: The mass of flames of the hell of eleven tongues cannot be compared to even a sixteenth of the pain of the hells.

original: las kyis byas pa'i tshor ba de dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'di ltar de sems can dmyal ba me lce bcu gcig par lo 'bum phrag du mar sreg go /
analyzed: las kyis byas pa'i tshor ba de dag ji srid du de'i sdig pa'i las bcom zhing spangs la zad par ma byas pa de srid du 'di ltar de sems can dmyal ba me lce bcu gcig par lo 'bum phrag du mar sreg go /
translated: Until the beings’ negative acts have been overcome, relinquished, and exhausted, they will continue to burn and boil in the hell of eleven tongues for many hundreds of thousands of years.

original: 'tshed do // de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'tshed do // de phyis sems can dmyal ba de las thar bar 'gyur te /
translated: “When they finally escape this hell,

original: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang / dud 'gro dag tu ma skye la /
analyzed: thar nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis yi dvags dang / dud 'gro dag tu ma skye la /
translated: if the karmic actions of their next lives as starving spirits or animals have not yet come to fruition,

original: mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na de zhal che yon por bcad pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de rtag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas gdungs shing yan lag thams cad rnam par sreg pa dang / dbul zhing tshe thung ba dang /
analyzed: mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mir skyes na de zhal che yon por bcad pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus de rtag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas gdungs shing yan lag thams cad rnam par sreg pa dang / dbul zhing tshe thung ba dang /
translated: If one is born with the general lot in life of a human, then due to the causally concordant experiential effects of having rendered judgment in a biased manner, one will constantly be afflicted by hunger and thirst, and all one’s limbs will be burning. One will be poor and have a short life.

original: ngag yid mi ches pa dang / shin tu glen pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang / rkang lag nyams pa dang / dri ma can dang / gnas ngan pa sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo'i khyim du 'jug cing tshe gcig gi bar du shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //🔽de nas gzhan yang /🔽dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
analyzed: ngag yid mi ches pa dang / shin tu glen pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang / rkang lag nyams pa dang / dri ma can dang / gnas ngan pa sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo'i khyim du 'jug cing tshe gcig gi bar du shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro // de nas gzhan yang / dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi 'khor la brtags na /
translated: One’s speech will not be trusted, one will be extremely stupid, one’s body will be ugly, one’s limbs will be defective, one will be dirty, and one will live in a dirty place, such as a house at a crossroads or a junction, and suffer greatly for the duration of one’s life.

original: des sems can dmyal ba chen po de'i 'khor bcu bdun pa ni gcig kyang ma mthong ngo ////
analyzed: des sems can dmyal ba chen po de'i 'khor bcu bdun pa ni gcig kyang ma mthong ngo ////
translated: “As the monk who has knowledge of the effects of the ripening of karmic actions continues to examine the regions that surround the great Hell of Screaming, he will not see a single one of the seventeen surrounding regions.

original: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag @343b pa; bam po bcu gcig pa /🔽de nas gzhan yang /
analyzed: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag @343b pa; bam po bcu gcig pa / de nas gzhan yang /
translated: The Eleventh Section

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge slong de 'di ltar zhi ba /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge slong de 'di ltar zhi ba /
translated: “The monk who practices yoga and attends to the internal phenomena will think, ‘This is peace,

original: rga ba med cing 'chi ba med pa /
analyzed: rga ba med cing 'chi ba med pa /
translated: free from aging and death,

original: zag pa med pa /
analyzed: zag pa med pa /
translated: free from defilements,🔽and the path to nirvāṇa.’

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug pa de'i brtson pas bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis mthong nas bar snang la spyod pa'i lha rnams la bsnyad pa nas /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug pa de'i brtson pas bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis mthong nas bar snang la spyod pa'i lha rnams la bsnyad pa nas /
translated: The yakṣas will see his diligence and inform the gods who live in the sky,

original: rgya cher sbyar te /
analyzed: rgya cher sbyar te /
translated: and so on, up to🔽the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings, the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the gods of the Heaven Free from Strife, the gods of the Heaven of Joy, the gods of the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, and the gods of the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations.

original: 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi bar la bsnyad de /
analyzed: 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi bar la bsnyad de /
translated: They will inform the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the gods of the Heaven Free from Strife, the gods of the Heaven of Joy, the gods of the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, and the gods of the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations.

original: 'di ltar dzambu gling du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ces bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dzambu gling du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ces bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te /
translated: ‘In Jambudvīpa, a noble son named so-and-so …’

original: sa gzhan bcu pa'i bar la zhugs pa bdud kyi yul gyi gzhi la mi 'dod cing /
analyzed: sa gzhan bcu pa'i bar la zhugs pa bdud kyi yul gyi gzhi la mi 'dod cing /
translated: ‘… has entered the tenth ground and does not wish to remain in the domain of the māras.’

original: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las byung ba'i sred pa'i dngos po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yul gyi dngos po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de 'od chung gi lha rnams kyis thos nas bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las byung ba'i sred pa'i dngos po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yul gyi dngos po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de 'od chung gi lha rnams kyis thos nas bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will be delighted and think, ‘The faction of the māras will be diminished,

original: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ro zhes yid dga' bar 'gyur ro //🔽de nas gzhan yang /🔽dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa 'khor ba'i 'ching ba gcod pa la brtson pa de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ro zhes yid dga' bar 'gyur ro // de nas gzhan yang / dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa 'khor ba'i 'ching ba gcod pa la brtson pa de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: and the faction of the sacred Dharma will be exalted.’

original: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba yin te sred pas bslus pa /
analyzed: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba yin te sred pas bslus pa /
translated: “The monk who has knowledge of the ripening of karmic effects, who is diligent in severing the bonds of cyclic existence, will then think, ‘Alas, these beings are suffering. They are deceived by craving,

original: gti mug gi kun tu sbyor bas bcings pa /
analyzed: gti mug gi kun tu sbyor bas bcings pa /
translated: bound by the fetters of delusion,

original: sems bag la nyal rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa /
analyzed: sems bag la nyal rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa /
translated: and they are endowed with latent tendencies.

original: dus gsum du 'tshed kyang 'khor ba gcad pa'i phyir @344a *//
analyzed: dus gsum du 'tshed kyang 'khor ba gcad pa'i phyir @344a *//
translated: Even though they are boiled in the three times, they do not cut through cyclic existence.

original: 'bad par mi byed pa'i sems can 'di dag la snying med dam ci /
analyzed: 'bad par mi byed pa'i sems can 'di dag la snying med dam ci /
translated: Do these beings who do not strive have no heart?

original: 'on te snying la mi shes pa zhig yod dam /
analyzed: 'on te snying la mi shes pa zhig yod dam /
translated: Or do they have a heart that is ignorant?

original: 'on te shes pa yod kyang yid 'byung bar mi byid dam /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa yod kyang yid 'byung bar mi byid dam /
translated: Or, even if they have knowledge, do they not feel revulsion?

original: sems can 'di dag gi rnam par shes pa de gang zhig yin /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag gi rnam par shes pa de gang zhig yin /
translated: What is the consciousness of these beings?

original: gal te sems can 'di ltar mtho ris su yun ring du gnas kyang yid 'byung bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te sems can 'di ltar mtho ris su yun ring du gnas kyang yid 'byung bar bya ba yin na /
translated: If one should feel revulsion even if one were to remain in the higher realms for a long time,

original: 'di ltar sems sra zhing mkhrang ba de lta ci smos /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems sra zhing mkhrang ba de lta ci smos /
translated: what need is there to mention this hard and solid mind?

original: gang gnod pa'i rnam pa du ma kun gyis sdug bsngal sdes su myong yang skye bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gang gnod pa'i rnam pa du ma kun gyis sdug bsngal sdes su myong yang skye bar mi byed do //
translated: Even if one were to experience suffering through many kinds of harm, one would not be born.

original: yun ring po nas bag la nyal rjes su 'brang ba'i sems la mi mthun pa lnga yod de /
analyzed: yun ring po nas bag la nyal rjes su 'brang ba'i sems la mi mthun pa lnga yod de /
translated: There are five things that are disagreeable to the mind that is pursued by latent tendencies over a long period of time.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang / bral ba'o //
analyzed: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang / bral ba'o //
translated: aging, sickness, death, encountering the unpleasant, and being separated from the pleasant.

original: gzhan yang / nyes dmigs kyi gnod pa bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang / nyes dmigs kyi gnod pa bcu 'byung ste /
translated: Moreover, ten kinds of harm of misfortune arise.

original: bkres pa dang / skom pa'i nyes dmigs dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs dang / yul nas yul du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba'i nyes dmigs dang / gzhan gyis brnyas pa'i nyes dmigs dang / gzhan gyis bcom pa'i nyes dmigs dang /
analyzed: bkres pa dang / skom pa'i nyes dmigs dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs dang / yul nas yul du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba'i nyes dmigs dang / gzhan gyis brnyas pa'i nyes dmigs dang / gzhan gyis bcom pa'i nyes dmigs dang /
translated: the faults of hunger and thirst, the faults of being separated from what is dear, the faults of going from place to place, the faults of death and birth, the faults of being despised by others, the faults of being defeated by others,

original: grang ba dang / tsha ba'i nyes dmigs dang / zlas dbye ba'i nyes dmigs dang / 'byor ba rgud pa'i nyes dmigs dang / 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs te /
analyzed: grang ba dang / tsha ba'i nyes dmigs dang / zlas dbye ba'i nyes dmigs dang / 'byor ba rgud pa'i nyes dmigs dang / 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs te /
translated: the faults of cold and heat, the faults of being separated from friends, the faults of the decline of prosperity, and the faults of desire.

original: de ltar mdor na nyes dmigs bcu dag gis sems mngon par gnod par byas kyang /
analyzed: de ltar mdor na nyes dmigs bcu dag gis sems mngon par gnod par byas kyang /
translated: In brief, although the mind is afflicted by these ten faults,

original: kye mi dga' bar mi byed pa'i sems @344b can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye mi dga' bar mi byed pa'i sems @344b can 'di dag ni /
translated: alas, these beings do not become unhappy.

original: ae ma thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems dgra lta bu g-yos pa dang / rna ba dang / snying med cing rdo dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems yul rnam pa mang pos dam pa'i chos la nam yang dga' bar mi byed pa /
analyzed: ae ma thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems dgra lta bu g-yos pa dang / rna ba dang / snying med cing rdo dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems yul rnam pa mang pos dam pa'i chos la nam yang dga' bar mi byed pa /
translated: Alas! Since beginningless time, the mind has been like an enemy, moving about, without ears, without a heart, like a stone, like a diamond. It never delights in the holy Dharma, no matter what the object.

original: yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / reg pa dang / ro dang / dri dug dang / mtshon dang / me lta bu'i sred pas rtag tu chog mi shes pas dug lta bu'i yul lnga dang / chom rkun lta bu'i skye mched drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes pa dang /
analyzed: yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / reg pa dang / ro dang / dri dug dang / mtshon dang / me lta bu'i sred pas rtag tu chog mi shes pas dug lta bu'i yul lnga dang / chom rkun lta bu'i skye mched drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes pa dang /
translated: It is never satisfied with objects of craving, like poison, weapons, or fire, such as forms, sounds, textures, tastes, and smells. It does not know the five poisons as objects, the six sense-spheres as thieves, the seven factors of enlightenment,🔽or the eightfold noble path as a road to travel. It does not know the nine abodes of sentient beings,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'gro bar mi spro pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu mi shes pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi shes pa dang / sa bcu gcig gi rnam par dpyod pa la blun pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis kyi skye ba dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'gro bar mi spro pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu mi shes pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi shes pa dang / sa bcu gcig gi rnam par dpyod pa la blun pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis kyi skye ba dang /
translated: or the ten virtuous actions. It is stupid about the analysis of the eleven stages, and it is born from the twelve sense-spheres.

original: gnas pa la rab tu rnam par spyod pa mkhas pa dang / mi mkhas pa la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: gnas pa la rab tu rnam par spyod pa mkhas pa dang / mi mkhas pa la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: It is engaged in the skill of abiding, and it is engaged in the lack of skill.

original: sa gong ma bcu gsum gyi spyod pa la blun pa /
analyzed: sa gong ma bcu gsum gyi spyod pa la blun pa /
translated: It is foolish with regard to the conduct of the higher grounds.

original: sems kyi dmigs pa bcu bzhi dang 'grogs pa /
analyzed: sems kyi dmigs pa bcu bzhi dang 'grogs pa /
translated: It is accompanied by the fourteen mental objects.

original: gnod pa bco lnga mi bzod pa /
analyzed: gnod pa bco lnga mi bzod pa /
translated: It is unable to bear the fifteen kinds of harm.

original: gnod pa sdig pa'i mun pa bcu drug gis gnas pa /
analyzed: gnod pa sdig pa'i mun pa bcu drug gis gnas pa /
translated: It abides in the sixteen kinds of darkness of evil harm.🔽It is accompanied by the seventeen kinds of childish analysis, the eighteen kinds of openings for the arising of feeling, the nineteen kinds of streets for the wandering of the beings, and the twenty kinds of abodes of the enemy.

original: byis pa'i shin tu rnam par dpyod pa bcu bdun dang / tshor ba rab tu 'byung ba'i bug bco brgyad dang / 'gro ba rnam par rgyu ba'i srang bcu dgu dang / dgra gnas pa nyi shus sems de rnam pa nyi shur bslus par rig nas de sems can la snying rje bar sems so //
analyzed: byis pa'i shin tu rnam par dpyod pa bcu bdun dang / tshor ba rab tu 'byung ba'i bug bco brgyad dang / 'gro ba rnam par rgyu ba'i srang bcu dgu dang / dgra gnas pa nyi shus sems de rnam pa nyi shur bslus par rig nas de sems can la snying rje bar sems so //
translated: Having understood that the mind is deceived in these twenty ways, he feels compassion for sentient beings.

original: dge slong de las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa la rab tu rnam par dpyod par @345a *//
analyzed: dge slong de las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa la rab tu rnam par dpyod par @345a *//
translated: “The monk who is investigating the ripening of the phenomena of action will think as follows:

original: byed de / 'di ltar de bdud kyi 'ching ba gcod pa dag la rtag tu brtson par byed cing de nas yang blo skyed par byed de /🔽sems can dmyal ba du 'bod las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba ches sdig pa che ba yod pa de'i thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan tsha ba zhes bya ba nye par byas pa'i las rab tu bdo bas kun nas
analyzed: byed de / 'di ltar de bdud kyi 'ching ba gcod pa dag la rtag tu brtson par byed cing de nas yang blo skyed par byed de / sems can dmyal ba du 'bod las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba ches sdig pa che ba yod pa de'i thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan tsha ba zhes bya ba nye par byas pa'i las rab tu bdo bas kun nas
translated: He is always diligent in cutting the bonds of Mara and then he generates the thought:🔽“There is another hell, more evil than the Saṃjīva hell.🔽With knowledge derived from hearing he sees that there is another great hell called Tapana, which is created by the power of the karma of beings who have accumulated evil deeds.

original: bslang ba / sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod las gnod pa bcu 'gyur gyis lhag pa zhig yod pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: bslang ba / sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod las gnod pa bcu 'gyur gyis lhag pa zhig yod pa mthong ngo //
translated: The suffering there is ten times greater than in the Saṃjīva hell.

original: 'khor bcu drug la /
analyzed: 'khor bcu drug la /
translated: There are sixteen neighboring hells:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: rab tu sreg pa chen po dang / padma dkar po lta bu dang / sbrul 'khyil pa lta bu dang / zangs bzhus par nya 'khyug pa lta bu dang / lcags kyi bum pa dang / chu bo dmar po 'bab pa dang / rkang dang /
analyzed: rab tu sreg pa chen po dang / padma dkar po lta bu dang / sbrul 'khyil pa lta bu dang / zangs bzhus par nya 'khyug pa lta bu dang / lcags kyi bum pa dang / chu bo dmar po 'bab pa dang / rkang dang /
translated: the Great Burning, the White Lotus, the Coiled Snake, the Boiling Copper and Fish, the Iron Pot, the Flowing Red River, the Foot,

original: rus pa la srin bu mang ba dang / skye bo thams cad sreg pa dang / sar 'byin mtha' yas dang / padma chen po lta bu dang / mtha' drag dang / rus pa rdo rje lta bu 'byung zhing 'du ba dang / lcags nag po'i skud pas 'dral zhing gcod pa tsha ba dang /
analyzed: rus pa la srin bu mang ba dang / skye bo thams cad sreg pa dang / sar 'byin mtha' yas dang / padma chen po lta bu dang / mtha' drag dang / rus pa rdo rje lta bu 'byung zhing 'du ba dang / lcags nag po'i skud pas 'dral zhing gcod pa tsha ba dang /
translated: The worms in the bones, the burning of all beings, the endless emergence, the lotus-like, the fierce end, the emergence and gathering of vajra-like bones, the burning of being cut and torn by black iron threads,

original: srin bu na kra dang / 'khor lo dang / me 'jigs 'jigs ltar skyes pa dang / nags tshal gyi me mun pa ltar 'khrigs pa dang / bung ba rdo rje lta bus gnod pa'i go cha zhes bya ste /
analyzed: srin bu na kra dang / 'khor lo dang / me 'jigs 'jigs ltar skyes pa dang / nags tshal gyi me mun pa ltar 'khrigs pa dang / bung ba rdo rje lta bus gnod pa'i go cha zhes bya ste /
translated: the worms, the wheels, the terrifyingly born, the forest fire-like darkness, and the vajra-like bee-harm armor.

original: 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor bcu drug yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i 'khor bcu drug yin te /
translated: These are the sixteen surrounding hells of the great Saṃjīva hell.

original: der tshe ni bgrang du mi lang ngo //
analyzed: der tshe ni bgrang du mi lang ngo //
translated: The lifespan there is incalculable.

original: der sems can dag las gang gis @345b skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
analyzed: der sems can dag las gang gis @345b skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
translated: What karma causes beings to be born there?

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
translated: Inquiring with knowledge derived from hearing, he will notice that

original: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung pa dang; rdzun smra ba dang / log par lta ba kun tu ba sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang gis srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung pa dang; rdzun smra ba dang / log par lta ba kun tu ba sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur la /
translated: “What are those ten? They are killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, alcohol consumption, lying, slander, harsh speech, idle talk, greed, and wrong views.

original: las kyi nyer bsdog pa dang / las kun gyi mjug kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi nyer bsdog pa dang / las kun gyi mjug kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'gyur ro //
translated: “One will be born in the great hell of Heat due to the preparation for the action, the completion of the action, and the subsequent engagement in the action.

original: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen por tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen por tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “When one is separated from one’s body, one will fall into the lower realms and be born in the great hell of Heat.

original: de la srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung pa dang / rdzun smra ba rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / chang 'thung pa dang / rdzun smra ba rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: “The results of killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, alcohol consumption, and lying have already been explained.

original: log par lta ba ni gang gis kun tu bsten cing bsgoms la pha rol la'ang bstan pa yin te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: log par lta ba ni gang gis kun tu bsten cing bsgoms la pha rol la'ang bstan pa yin te / 'di lta ste /
translated: “What is wrong view? It is the view that one should not follow, cultivate, or teach to others.🔽“What is that view?

original: sbyin pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa med do //
translated: It is the view that there is no generosity,

original: mchod sbyin med do //
analyzed: mchod sbyin med do //
translated: There is no sacrifice.

original: legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do //
analyzed: legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do //
translated: There is no ripening of the fruits of good and bad actions.

original: 'jig rten 'di med do //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di med do //
translated: There is no this world.

original: 'jig rten pha rol med do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol med do //
translated: There is no other world.

original: ma med do //
analyzed: ma med do //
translated: There is no mother.

original: pha med do //
analyzed: pha med do //
translated: There is no father.

original: zhes de skad chad par smra ba ni las yod pa 'jig pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes de skad chad par smra ba ni las yod pa 'jig pa yin te /
translated: Those who say such nihilistic things destroy the existence of karma.

original: gzhan dag la yang ston cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed la yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa log par lta ba bskyed nas /
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang ston cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed la yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa log par lta ba bskyed nas /
translated: They teach others, establish others, and delight others in the production of wrong views.

original: pha rol dag la las kyi lam gyi rgyu med par ston pa ni chom rkun pa tshul bzang por 'chos pa @346a *//
analyzed: pha rol dag la las kyi lam gyi rgyu med par ston pa ni chom rkun pa tshul bzang por 'chos pa @346a *//
translated: They teach others that the path of karma does not exist. They are thieves who pretend to be good people.

original: yin te / de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yin te / de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When they separate from their bodies, they fall into the lower realms, into the Great Hell of Heat.

original: de la las kyi lam dang / las kyi 'bras bu yod bzhin du rnam par slu ba yin te /
analyzed: de la las kyi lam dang / las kyi 'bras bu yod bzhin du rnam par slu ba yin te /
translated: There, they deceive others about the existence of the path of karma and the fruits of karma.

original: de 'chi ba'i dus bas nas srid pa bar ma'i bar du skye ba na /
analyzed: de 'chi ba'i dus bas nas srid pa bar ma'i bar du skye ba na /
translated: When they die and are born in the intermediate existence,

original: ltas ngan pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: ltas ngan pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: the signs of bad omens will appear.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: 'jigs pa mchog tu mi bzad pa mun par nges par gyur pa dang / so so nas 'jigs par byed pa seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / gung dang / sbrul mang po phug dang / mun pa med pa na 'dug pa dang /
analyzed: 'jigs pa mchog tu mi bzad pa mun par nges par gyur pa dang / so so nas 'jigs par byed pa seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / gung dang / sbrul mang po phug dang / mun pa med pa na 'dug pa dang /

analyzed: des gzhan yang ri che zhing mtho ba de'i mgo'i steng du myur bar 'ong ba mthong ba dang / stag dang / seng ge de dag kyang so so nas 'jigs par byed cing sgra 'byin pa thos pa dang; gzhan dag kyang gzugs mchog tu dman zhing snying rje rje ltar 'dug pa mthong ba dang /
translated: Moreover, they see a large mountain quickly coming down on top of their heads, and they hear the lions and tigers each roaring in a terrifying way. They see others with extremely inferior bodies, looking pitiful.

translated: They will see the causes of
